column4: i just installed dapper (though I have run breezy for about a year before) and I need help setting it up with my printer, anyone care to help?
can someone help me set up my printer?
can someone help me get my printer working, please?
I'll take a stab at it, but promise nothing
I guess the tutorial was no good?
yep
i send a print command, it appears in the queue as printing, but nothing comes out
then it disappears from the queue
what's the printer?
I had to run cat /usr/share/foo2zjs/firmware/sihp1020.dl > /dev/usblp0
it works now :) thanks
what the... I'd have never thought of that
there's a little tutorial on linuxprinting.org what that very command
hey there's more there you might want to read if you haven't already.  Try this link http://openprinting.org/show_printer.cgi?recnum=HP-LaserJet_1020
thanks a lot :)
I saw something (and a fix) about having to restart the printer after each job.
i tried that before, it's just that on my computer it was /dev/usblp0 instead of /dev/usb/lp0
let me try to print 2 jobs then
you can also administer your print server in a browser.  Localhost:631 is cups admin
no, i printed 2 jobs fine
cool
you're awesome
sometimes.  Don't ask my wife though. :)
